Daniel P. Ziperovich, MD is a physician who has a lease with Surgery Associates, a partnership, for 16122 8th Avenue SW, Suite E-1, Seattle, WA 98166. The lease is for 3 years, with an option to extend for 2 more years. The monthly rent is $40,000. The first amendment to the lease was executed on April 14, 2023.


Question: What is the term of the lease?
Answer: The term of the lease is 16 years, from June 1, 2018 to May 31, 2023.


Question: What is the monthly rent?
Answer: The monthly rent is $40,000.

3.    Early Termination of Lease Due to Death or Disability:  Landlord agrees to terminate the Lease effective ninety (90) days after receiving written notice and copy of certificate of Edwin S. Chin death or Edwin S. Chin becomes Disabled.  For purposes of this section, “Disabled” shall mean the inability of Edwin S. Chin to perform his customary duties for a period of twelve (12) consecutive months.  In the event the Landlord disputes whether Edwin S. Chin is Disabled, Edwin S. Chin shall submit to examinations by two medical doctors, one selected by the Tenant and the other selected by the Landlord.  The two medical doctors shall examine Edwin S. Chin and determine whether it is more likely than not that Edwin S. Chin will be unable to perform his customary duties for a period of twelve (12) consecutive months from the date of the examination.  If the two medial doctors agree, their decision shall be binding and final.  If the two medical doctors disagree, they shall select a third doctor, whose determination shall be final and binding.  In the event this clause is exercised, Tenant agrees to forfeit their security deposit as part of the early Lease termination.
Daniel P Ziperovich MD

First Amendment to Lease

Highline Professional Building

The parties to this First Amendment to Lease dated the June 1, 2018, are Highline Professional Building Associates, Limited Partnership (“Landlord”) and Daniel P. Ziperovich, MD. an individual (“Tenant”).	

WHEREAS, Landlord and Tenant have a binding Lease Agreement dated June 1, 2018, together the lease in and to the premises described in Exhibit A Legal Description of the Property more commonly known as Highline Professional Building, 16122 8th, Avenue SW, Suite E-1, City of Seattle, County of King, State of Washington.

The parties do hereby mutually agree to modify certain particulars of the Lease Agreement as follow:

1.	Section 4 Term

Section 4 shall be modified as follows:

“The term of the Lease shall be extended three (2) years commencing June 1, 2021 and ending May 31, 2022.”

2.	Section 5 Rent.

	Monthly rent for the extended term of the Lease shall be as follows:
Daniel P Ziperovich MD

Second Amendment to Lease

Highline Professional Building

The parties to this Second Amendment to Lease dated April 14, 2023, are Highline Professional Building Associates, Limited Partnership (“Landlord”) and Daniel P. Ziperovich, MD. an individual (“Tenant”).	

WHEREAS, Landlord and Tenant have a binding Lease Agreement dated June 1, 2018, and First Amended May 20, 2021 together the lease in and to the premises described in Exhibit A Legal Description of the Property more commonly known as Highline Professional Building, 16122 8th, Avenue SW, Suite E-1, City of Seattle, County of King, State of Washington.

The parties do hereby mutually agree to modify certain particulars of the Lease Agreement as follow:

1.	Section 4 Term

Section 4 shall be modified as follows:

“The term of the Lease shall be extended three (2) years commencing June 1, 2023 and ending May 31, 2025.”

2.	Section 5 Rent.
TERM

a) The term of the Lease shall be for sixteen (16) years, commencing on the first day of May, 1998, and ending on the last day of April, 2014.

POSSESSION

a) Lessee shall be entitled to possession on or about May 1, 1998 or upon completion of Tenant Improvement work.

b) In the event the Lessor shall permit the Lessee to occupy the Premises prior to the commencement date of the term of this Lease, such occupancy shall be subject to all the provisions of this Lease. Early possession shall not advance the termination date of this Lease, and Lessor shall not be responsible for equipment installed by the Lessee.

RENT

a) This Lease is the type commonly referred to as a “gross lease”. Lessee shall pay
